functions.comp.check_min(min_val)[source]¶

This function raises and exception if the minimum number provided is less than zero.

functions.comp.round3(func)[source]¶

Decorator that rounds the output of a function to 3 decimal places.

Note: Usese numpy.round() and not native round().
